Coordinator component¶

This page is the documentation of Coordinator

Coordinator: Service Coordinator¶

This a package that contains the main function for the service coordinator

service_coordinator.close_block()¶

This web service is for the blockchain, when a block is full the blockchain request this web service url: http://127.0.0.1:5001/close_block

service_coordinator.consult_founds()¶

Web service for the client, that execute the required proccess, calling all the correspond web service from the others components to get the user founds in the wallet url: http://127.0.0.1:5001/consult_founds

service_coordinator.create_wallet()¶

This web service create the wallet of the user url: http://127.0.0.1:5001/create_wallet

service_coordinator.get_something()¶

Main page

service_coordinator.register_data()¶

This web service is for valid the transaction which is going to the block, that means is the in carge of certificate the transactions url: http://127.0.0.1:5001/register_data

service_coordinator.run_service_coordinator(host: str, port: int)¶

This function runs the service coordinator that allow comunicate diferents services

Parameters

  • host (str) – the ip where the app will be host

  • port (int) – port is a localport controled for specfic OS

service_coordinator.show_block_chain()¶

This web service shows the blockchain url: http://127.0.0.1:5001/show_block_chain

service_coordinator.show_users()¶

This web service has the purpose of debugging code, allows to show all the wallets in the public ledger url: http://127.0.0.1:5001/show_users

service_coordinator.transaction_register()¶

Web service for the client, that execute all the required proccess to valid a transaction and add to the block the new transaction, before add the complete block to the blockchain url: http://127.0.0.1:5001/register_transaction

Coordinator: Config¶

This module contains the config

Coordinator: Middleware¶

This module has functions that coordinate all the blockchain system

class middleware.Middleware¶

This class register the required web service to coordinate all the functions of CryptoSD:Blockchain

close_block(dict_parameters)¶

This function allows to the blockchain, close a block through a hash

Parameters

dict_parameters (dict) – the block which is going to close the opencloser

Returns

the hash of the block

Return type

dict

consult_found_block_chain_service(dict_parameters)¶

This function allows to consume consult_found blockchain service that use the method POST

Parameters

dict_parameters (dict) – this parameter hava all parameters for use the service blockchain

Returns

this function return a response with format JSON

Return type

dict[str, Any]

consume_register_data(dict_parameters)¶

This function consume the service from Blockchain to make all the validations for the transaction, THIS SERVICE IS CONSUME FOR REGISTER

Returns

the transaction for the block

Return type

dict

consume_register_transaction(dict_parameters)¶

This function consume the service from register and allows to the blockchain add the transaction to the block

Returns

the transaction with all the validations

Return type

dict

consume_service(type_method, uri, dict_parameter: dict = {})¶

This function is used to consume a web service, and return a response, no matter if the communication fails

Parameters

  • type_method – the method where is going to pass the communication (POST/GET)

  • uri (str) – the url where is located the web service to consume

  • dict_parameter (dict) – the content of the payload

Returns

returns a custom dict with the url, status and content. The “Any” return is a JSON content

Return type

dict[str, Any]

get_block_chain()¶

This function allows to the user to see the blockchain, this function has the purpose of debug the code

get_user_list()¶

This function allows to the developers to see the users in the Blockchain across the public ledger

Returns

the list of the user accounts

Return type

dict

get_wallet(dict_parameters)¶

This function allows to the user request a account from the class wallet in Blockchain

Parameters

dict_parameters (dict) – the user name

Returns

the account of the user

Return type

dict

load_services()¶

This function execute with the instance of Middleware, so allows to add the principals web services

Coordinator: Class Controller¶

This module perform like someone who makes the mainstage for all the components

class controller.Controller¶

This controller perform like the driver of the app code

static close_block(block)¶

This function makes all the logic to connect the Blockchain with the OpenCloser component

Parameters

block (dict) – the block to close

Returns

a dict with the response

Return type

dict

static consult_founds(dict_parameters)¶

This function consume a service from Blockchain to get the money in a wallet, only if this wallet is valid

Parameters

account (str) – the wallet of the user

Returns

a dictionary with the account, founds in the wallet and the exist of the account

Return type

dict

static create_user(user)¶

This static method, load services and consume the service from Blockchain where is going to storage the wallets of the users

Parameters

user (dict) – the name of the user

Returns

the wallet with the message

Return type

dict

static register_data(dict_parameters)¶

This function register and validate the data

Params dict_parameters

Returns

return a dictionary with the valid transaction

Return type

dict

static register_transaction(dict_transaction)¶

This function allows to the blockchain receive the transaction and add to the current block

Returns

a dict with the response

Return type

dict

static show_block_chain()¶

This method static, load services and consume the service show_block_chain

Returns

return a dictionary with status information and the blockchain

Return type

dict

static show_wallets()¶

This static method, load the services and consume the service from Blockchain to show all the users in the public ledger

Returns

all the wallets

Return type

dict

Coordinator: Main coordinator¶

This module run the coordinator app

main_coordinator.main()¶

This function allows the user to start the app with or without debug mode, and put the ip and port of the coordinator app
